text: The 2015 European Under-19 Rugby Union Championship (Rugby Europe Championship) is the ninth edition of the European Under-19 Rugby Union Championship for Under 19 national teams. It will be held in Lisbon, Portugal from October 25 to November 1. The tournament serves as Europe's qualifier for the 2016 World Rugby Under 20 Trophy. ==Matches== ===Quarter finals=== \---- \---- \---- ===Semi finals=== ===Cup=== \---- ===Bowl=== \---- ==Play-off games== ===7th place game=== ===5th place game=== ===3rd place game=== ===Final=== ==Final Rankings and Statistics== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" align=center |- |- !
